stripped_text: Play only if the Runner accessed at least 1 card during his or her last turn. Trace 4 If successful, trash 1 installed program with an install cost equal to or less than the amount by which your trace strength exceeded the Runner's link strength.
text:
Play only if the Runner accessed at least 1 card during his or her last turn.
<trace>Trace 4</trace> If successful, trash 1 installed program with an install cost equal to or less than the amount by which your trace strength exceeded the Runner's link strength.
title: Trojan Horse
